border.description: Whether or not to display a border

size.description: Describes the dimensions of the list, if not specified, defaults to default
size.description_zh: 描述列表的尺寸，如不指定默认为 default

tableLayout.description: The layout-fixed of the table style in the description, when set to fixed, will divide the width evenly.
tableLayout.description_zh: 描述中表格样式的 layout-fixed，当设置成 fixed 时，宽度会均分。

:colon.description: The content displayed after the label text is generally configured as follows:
:colon.description_zh: 标签文字后显示的内容，一般配置为  :

:column.type: | number| {xs?: number;sm?: number;md?: number;lg?: number;xl?: number;xxl?: number;xxxl?: number;}
:column.description: A row holds several columns of data, one for one column. You can configure column as a number or object, and when configuring the object format, you can configure it as { xs: 1, md: 2, lg: 3 } to support responsive arrangement
:column.description_zh: 一行放置几列数据，一个数据为一列。支持配置 column 为数字或者对象，配置对象格式时，支持配置为 { xs: 1, md: 2, lg: 3 } 这种形式来支持响应式排列

:data.description: Describe the data for the list

:labelStyle.description: The style of the cell that displays the label
:labelStyle.description_zh: 显示标签的单元格的样式

:valueStyle.description: The style of the cell that displays the value
:valueStyle.description_zh: 显示值的单元格的样式
